commit.message: Consensus: Rename: Move consensus code to the consensus directory

commit.message:
Consensus: Rename: consensus/utilmoneystr.cpp belongs in libconsensus because
FormatMoney()

- My opinion: there's only satoshis (aka units) in libconsensus

files.patch:
@@ -138,7 +138,6 @@ BITCOIN_CORE_H = \
   ui_interface.h \
   undo.h \
   util.h \
-  utilmoneystr.h \
   utiltime.h \
   validationinterface.h \
   wallet/crypter.h \
@@ -271,6 +270,8 @@ libbitcoin_consensus_a_SOURCES = \
   consensus/transaction.h \

   consensus/uint256.h \
+  consensus/utilmoneystr.cpp \
